header.title: BuyMeACoffee-Africa
header.description_suffix: , an African platform inspired by Buy Me a Coffee, which allows creators, artists, developers, and entrepreneurs to receive financial support from their community via Mobile Money (Airtel Money, Orange Money, M-Pesa).

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: BuyMeACoffee Africa offers a simple, fast, and local way to support your favorite creators.
overview.creatorProfile: Each creator has their own profile page where visitors can:
overview.platform: The platform is 100% web and optimized for use on mobile, tablet, and PC.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: To start supporting your favourite creator, you first need to:
gettingStarted.completeProfile: Once logged in, complete your profile with:
gettingStarted.profileMobileMoney: Your Mobile Money number (to receive endorsements)

discover.title: Discover the creators
discover.intro: From the homepage or dashboard, you can:
discover.search: Search for a creator by name or category
discover.accessProfile: Access their profile to learn more about them

support.title: Support a creator
support.step3: Select the amount to send (e.g., 1, 3, or 5 coffees).
support.step4: Choose your Mobile Money payment method:
support.confirmation: Once the payment is validated, the creator receives an instant notification.

dashboard.title: Dashboard (for creators)
dashboard.intro: The dashboard allows each creator to:
dashboard.viewBackers: View their total amount of backers received
dashboard.manageProfile: Manage their profile and payment information

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.payments: Payments are processed securely via Mobile Money APIs.
security.storage: No banking information is stored on our servers.
security.disablePage: Creators can temporarily disable their public page if they wish.

faq.title: FAQ ‚Äî Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Q: Can I use multiple Mobile Money accounts?
faq.a1: Not yet. Only one account is associated with each profile.
faq.q2: Q: Can I withdraw my funds directly?
faq.a2: Yes, withdrawals are made automatically to your configured Mobile Money account.
faq.q3: Q: Does the app work on smartphones?
faq.a3: Yes! The app is fully responsive and optimized for all screens.
